function.name: mbedtls_asn1_write_len
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, size_t len )

function.name: mbedtls_asn1_write_tag
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, unsigned char tag )

function.name: mbedtls_asn1_write_raw_buffer
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, const unsigned char *buf, size_t size )

function.name: mbedtls_asn1_write_mpi
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, const mbedtls_mpi *X )

function.name: mbedtls_asn1_write_null
mbedtls_asn1_write_oid
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, const char *oid, size_t oid_len )

function.name: mbedtls_asn1_write_algorithm_identifier
mbedtls_asn1_write_bool
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, int boolean )

function.name: mbedtls_asn1_write_int
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, int val )

function.name: mbedtls_asn1_write_printable_string
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, const char *text, size_t text_len )

function.name: mbedtls_asn1_write_ia5_string
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, const char *text, size_t text_len )

function.name: mbedtls_asn1_write_bitstring
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, const unsigned char *buf, size_t bits )

function.name: mbedtls_asn1_write_octet_string
function.parameter_list: ( unsigned char **p, unsigned char *start, const unsigned char *buf, size_t size )

function.name: mbedtls_asn1_store_named_data
